name: Cheese
description: Artisanal cheeses crafted in small batches—aged, fresh, and brined varieties with international character and local flair.

items.name: Brie
items.description: Soft-ripened, bloomy rind cheese with a creamy center and delicate mushroomy notes.

items.name: Greek-Style Feta
items.description: Tangy, crumbly white cheese aged in brine with a creamy finish. Made with a blend of cow and goat milk.

items.name: Bleu d'Auvergne
items.description: Rich French-style blue with a soft texture and deep, earthy flavor.

items.name: Aged Gouda
items.description: Pressed and waxed for a nutty, firm cheese with a hint of caramel and salt crystals.

items.name: Manchego
items.description: Firm, buttery sheep’s milk cheese aged with a gentle sharpness and grassy aroma.

items.name: Asiago Fresco
items.description: Mild Italian-style cheese, semi-soft with a nutty flavor—perfect grated or sliced.

items.name: Swiss-Style
items.description: Emmental-style cheese with a smooth texture and signature holes. Sweet and nutty.

items.name: Taleggio
items.description: Washed-rind Italian cheese with a pungent aroma and meaty, creamy interior.

items.name: Aged Cheddar
items.description: Classic English-style cheddar, aged for depth with sharp, grassy notes and a smooth crumble.

items.name: Camembert
items.description: Soft, bloomy rind cheese with a rustic earthiness and smooth, melting interior.

items.name: Fresh Ricotta
items.description: Lusciously light and creamy whey cheese made fresh. Ideal for baking, pastas, or spreading.

name: Jams, Curds & Fillings
description: Lusciously cooked preserves, zesty curds, and fruit-forward fillings crafted for breakfast, baking, or cheese boards.

items.name: Strawberry Jam
items.description: Classic and comforting, made with ripe Jordanian strawberries and just a touch of lemon.

items.name: Blood Orange Marmalade
items.description: Bittersweet and bold with vibrant blood orange peel and juice.

items.name: Orange Marmalade
items.description: Bright and tangy with thick-cut orange peel and a smooth jelly finish.

items.name: Mandarin Orange Marmalade
items.description: Delicate, floral marmalade with sweet mandarin segments and zest.

items.name: Peach Jam
items.description: Summer-sweet jam made from golden peaches, cooked gently for full flavor.
specs: Pairs well with butter or yogurt

items.name: Apricot Jam
items.description: Tangy and vibrant, made with tree-ripened apricots and minimal sugar.

items.name: Apple Sauce
items.description: Slow-simmered apples with warm spices—no added sugar, just real fruit.

items.name: Lemon Curd
items.description: Rich and tart curd made with fresh lemons, eggs, and local butter.

items.name: Orange Curd
items.description: Creamy and sweet with fresh orange zest and a buttery finish.

items.name: Quince Paste (Membrillo)
items.description: Thick, sliceable Spanish-style quince paste perfect for cheese boards.

items.name: Quince Jam
items.description: Lightly spiced quince jam with floral notes and warm finish.

items.name: Fig Jam
items.description: Rich and earthy jam packed with whole figs and a hint of balsamic.

items.name: Raspberry Jam
items.description: Bright, tart, and full of texture—made with crushed raspberries.

items.name: Blueberry Jam
items.description: Deep and juicy with plump berries and a hint of vanilla.

name: Fresh Pasta
description: Our fresh pasta selection is crafted in small batches using semolina, local eggs, and seasonal ingredients. From pillowy gnocchi to silky ribbons, every cut is made for exceptional texture and flavor.

items.name: Ricotta Gnocchi
items.description: Delicate and airy dumplings made from ricotta. Light on the palate, rich in flavor.
specs: Pairs well with pesto or sage butter

items.name: Potato Gnocchi
items.description: A comforting classic—fluffy potato dumplings that shine with sage butter or tomato sauce.

items.name: Lasagna Sheets
items.description: Fresh, thin pasta sheets perfect for layering in lasagna, cannelloni, or timbales.

items.name: Parboiled Spätzle
items.description: Rustic egg noodles, parboiled and ready to toss in brown butter, cheese, or gravy.

items.name: Linguini
items.description: Long, flat ribbons ideal for seafood sauces, lemon cream, or pesto.

items.name: Spaghetti
items.description: The timeless classic. Pairs beautifully with tomato sauce, aglio e olio, or carbonara.

items.name: Tagliatelle
items.description: Silky, egg-rich ribbons made for ragù, porcini cream, or buttered peas.

items.name: Herb-Infused Pappardelle
items.description: Wide pasta ribbons with fresh garden herbs kneaded into the dough. Rich, aromatic, and striking.
specs: Pairs well with mushrooms or lamb

name: Pickles & Ferments
description: Bold, tangy, spicy—our house-made pickles and ferments bring flavor and depth to every plate.

items.name: Sweet & Hot Baby Cucumber Pickles
items.description: Crunchy baby cucumbers in a sweet brine with chili heat and whole spices.

items.name: Fermented Sriracha
items.description: Naturally fermented chili-garlic sauce with balanced heat and umami.

items.name: Green Chili Sauce
items.description: Bright and spicy green chili blend with herbs and garlic. Fermented and vibrant.

items.name: Fire Roasted Chili Sauce
items.description: Smoky, rich sauce made from fire-roasted chilies, fermented for complexity.

name: Dressings & Sauces
description: Bold, handmade dressings and sauces to finish any dish.

items.name: Umami’s House
items.description: A signature creamy dressing with savory herbs and a hint of garlic.

items.name: Peppercorn Ranch
items.description: Creamy, herby ranch with cracked peppercorns for a subtle kick.

items.name: Bleu Cheese Buttermilk
items.description: Tangy buttermilk dressing loaded with rich bleu cheese crumbles.

items.name: Caesar
items.description: Classic creamy Caesar with parmesan, anchovy, and lemon.

items.name: Honey Mustard
items.description: Sweet and sharp, made with local honey and Dijon mustard.

items.name: Herb Green Goddess
items.description: Lush and bright with fresh herbs, garlic, and lemon.

items.name: Raspberry Vinaigrette
items.description: Fruity, tangy vinaigrette made with ripe raspberries and balsamic.

items.name: Balsamic Vinaigrette
items.description: Smooth and rich with aged balsamic vinegar and extra virgin olive oil.

items.name: Sherry Vinaigrette
items.description: Sharp and elegant vinaigrette made with imported sherry vinegar.

items.name: Lemon Herb
items.description: Light and zesty with lemon juice, garlic, and chopped herbs.

items.name: Sweet Chili 🌶️
items.description: Sweet and tangy with a kick of red chili—great as a dip or glaze.

items.name: Miso Ginger Soy
items.description: Savory umami dressing with white miso, fresh ginger, and soy.

items.name: Chipotle-Lime 🌶️
items.description: Smoky chipotle peppers with zesty lime—bold, spicy, and addictive.
